item.title: Visualizing Git Repositories
item.description: TLDR: This are the high level steps to create visualizations for your own Git repositories as the example below. Use Gource for creating the git visualization PPM frames Use FFmpeg for converting PPM frames to MPEG/AVI (any codec) of your choice Use combination of sox and FFmpeg to add background music to the generated video (Optional). I did this step because I am anyways uploading this to YouTube). You can find all the pre-rendered videos here.
